sops.name: How to Filter qualified leads
sops.body: Regular qualified leads get a follow-up phone call in a week

sops.body: Explore the venue

sops.name: How To Conduct Event Teardown
sops.body: Once event is officially closed and doors are closed, onsite team to support marketing with the tear down and packaging of any remaining items from the event.

sops.name: How To Follow-Up On An Event
sops.body: Within 2 days post event, Marketing and Sales to organize an event retrospective, gather any additional details from company participants (leads, off hand meetings, lessons learned, kudos, etc) to include in overall follow up plan.

sops.name: How To Conduct Strategic Planning
sops.body: Review Go-to-Market (GTM) strategy - Ideal client profiles, targeted market of professionals (User or Economic Buyers), annual objectives.

sops.name: How To Select Conferences
sops.body: Research for industry, technology, and/or business conferences - event reputation, size of event, User/Economic Buyer accessibility, location of event, cost of event, duration, access to previous attendee lists, and access to registered attendee lists (ahead of event).
